participant_1.background:
I think the most difficult thing I've ever done is balancing school and my job.
I spent my last birthday playing pretend with my friends in the LARP world, and it was so much fun!
I'm still trying to figure out if my car is sentient or not.
I enjoy reading books from different cultures, including books from my parents' homeland of Italy.
I'm looking for a home in the country where I can enjoy my vintage cars and the peace and quiet of the winter season.

participant_2.background:
I like music that reminds me of my family and friends.
I miss my dog, but I have a new friend in my cat.
I will go to Comic Con if I can wear my favorite hoodie.
I try to stay active and keep my mind busy to avoid feeling anxious.
I'd love to have lunch with George Lucas and talk about the powers of crystals in Star Wars.

content.text: Hi! I'm looking for someone to talk to about my recent birthday.
Hi! My birthday was just last week.
What did you do for your birthday?
I went to Comic Con with my friends.
That sounds like so much fun! I went to a LARP event for my last birthday.
It's like live action role play. We dress up as different characters and pretend to be in a fantasy world.
That sounds really cool! I've always wanted to try that.
It's a lot of fun. You should definitely check it out!
I will! Do you have any other hobbies?
I love reading books, especially books from different cultures.
Me too! I love learning about different cultures.
I'm looking for a home in the country where I can enjoy my vintage cars and the peace and quiet of the winter season.
That sounds like a beautiful dream. I'd love to have a home like that.
Me too! It's something I'm working towards.
I'm sure you'll achieve it! You seem like a very determined person.
